recipe_name: Black-eyed bean dip with garlic toasts
author: Ross Burden
method: For the dip, whiz the sesame seeds in a blender until finely ground. Mix with the remaining dip ingredients and set aside. For the garlic toasts, toast the bread in a pan with the garlic, butter and parsley for 2 minutes until golden. Serve with the dip.
ingredients: 2 tsp sesame seeds, toasted,  ¼ red onion, finely chopped,  1 clove garlic, finely chopped,  ½ tin black-eyed beans, rinsed and drained,  ½ lime, juice only,  1 tbsp olive oil,  1 tbsp chopped fresh coriander,  100g/3½oz plain yoghurt,  2 slices bread,  1 clove garlic, finely chopped,  3 tbsp chopped parsley,  35g/1½oz butter
